block_comment: This block of code describes a sequential logic functionality. Specifically, it handles a register update on the positive edge of a clock cycle ("posedge clk"). The new state of the 'stg3_r' register is assigned by the non-blocking assignment statement ("stg3_ns") which implies an action (assigning 'stg3_ns' to 'stg3_r') will happen at a certain time delay (defined by "TCQ") after the clock edge.
